locations.name: Operation Room
description:
You are in a square shaped operation room with nothing arround you except for the bed you woke up on
and a mirror to your left staring straight at you. There are double doors to the north
of you as the only exit from this room.

locations.name: Hallway Middle
description:
You reach a long, horizontal hallway with darkness to the left and right (west and east) of you.
An ominous, mysterious silence fills the hallway as a flickering light above you sets the mood.
You can barely identify a door to your left (west) but it seems to be barricaded.
To your right, you can see another flickering light in the distance.

locations.name: Hallway East 1
description:
You reach another flickering light in the long hallway with two doors on the left leading to the Men's and 
Ladies' bathrooms, and one door on the right with a sign that reads "Janitor's Closet"
